Data Structures

struct  Persist

Detailed Description

The class PbNumberRecord will be used to store phone numbers in non-volatile memory. All methods to take access to the saved Pb entry data are defined in this class.

BOOLEAN PbNumberRecord::IsRecordDeleted (   )  [virtual]
 

Method checks if current phone number data field is valid.

Returns:
TRUE = data field is deleted or invalid; FALSE = data field is valid.

Reimplemented from Record.

BOOLEAN PbNumberRecord::IsValid (   )  [inline]
 

void PbNumberRecord::MarkDeleted (   )  [virtual]
 

Method sets the currentphone number data state to "deleted". This means that the saved data are invalid and could not be read anymore. This method is called if phone book entries will be deleted. Furtermore during the parent class initialisation if the provider data file will be created new with empty phone book entries.

Reimplemented from Record.

void PbNumberRecord::SetData (  const UINT8 *  data  )  [virtual]
 

Method writes phone number data to non-volatile memory.

Parameters:
